en.phoneToCallIfProblems:
0300 303 0642
Monday - Friday - Phones and Webchat are open 8am-6pm.
Closed on Saturday and Sunday.
en.responseTime: We aim to get back to you within 5 days
en.emailIfProblems: Send us a message
en.chatDown: The web chat service is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.
en.noAgentsAvailable: No agents are available, please try again later.
en.allAgentsBusy: All our web chat agents are busy helping other people. Please try again later or contact us using one of the ways above.
en.chatClosed:
Web chat is now closed.\nOpening hours are Monday, Wednesday and Friday -phones are open 8am-6pm and Webchat open 8am-8pm.
Tuesday and Thursday - Webchat and phones are open 8am-8pm.
Saturdays - Webchat and phones are open 8am-2pm.
en.chatAlreadyOpen: A web chat window is already open.
en.chatOpeningHours:
Monday, Wednesday and Friday -phones are open 8am-6pm and Webchat open 8am-8pm.
Tuesday and Thursday - Webchat and phones are open 8am-8pm.
Saturdays - Webchat and phones are open 8am-2pm.
en.feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.

cy.responseTime: Rydym yn amcanu ymateb o fewn 5 diwrnod gwaith
cy.emailIfProblems: Anfonwch neges atom
cy.chatDown: Nid yw’r gwasanaeth sgwrsio dros y we ar gael ar hyn o bryd; rhowch gynnig arall arni yn hwyrach ymlaen.
cy.chatWithAnAgent: Sgwrsio dros y we gydag asiant
cy.noAgentsAvailable: Nid oes asiant ar gael ar hyn o bryd; rhowch gynnig arall arni yn hwyrach ymlaen.
cy.allAgentsBusy: Mae ein gwasanaeth sgwrsio dros y we yn brysur ar hyn o bryd. Rhowch gynnig arall arni yn hwyrach ymlaen neu cysylltwch â ni drwy un o’r dulliau uchod.
cy.chatClosed: Mae’r gwasanaeth sgwrsio dros y we nawr ar gau.\nYr oriau agor yw dydd Llun i ddydd Gwener, 8:30am - 5pm.
cy.chatAlreadyOpen: Mae ffenestr sgwrsio dros y we ar agor yn barod.
cy.feedback: Mae hwn yn wasanaeth newydd - bydd eich adborth yn ein helpu ni i’w wella.
